entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -17.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 4:52 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -17.4°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 0.0 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -19.8°C
Wind: W 55 km/h gust 78 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with rain late in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
